briefTitle: Effect of GM1 in Prevention of Taxanes Induced Neurotoxicity in Operable Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Effect of Monosialotetrahexosyl Ganglioside (GM1) in Prevention of Taxanes Induced Neurotoxicity in Breast Cancer Patients Who Received Taxanes-based Adjuvant Chemotherapy: A Multi-center, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Trial
